attributes.action: A 2nd Brexit referendum now we have the details of the agreement with the EU
attributes.additional_details: The current political environment is damaging this country’s reputation I. The international stage. The ‘politics’, back stabbing and nonsense need to be removed from this decision. People need the facts and not fictitious promises and now that they are available the decision needs to be given to everyone, not to be left in the hands of of MPs who are pushing their own agendas.
attributes.background: The original Brexit referendum was held before any negotiations had taken place. Voters were not provided with the precise agreement that would be available. Now the details are available this should be put to a second vote. Three options should be given: Remain, negotiated agreement, no agreement.
